016
017package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.file;
018
019import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.Configuration;
020import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.api.MappedConfiguration;
021import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
022import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
023import org.jetbrains.annotations.Unmodifiable;
024
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.nio.file.Files;
027import java.nio.file.Path;
028import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Objects;
031import java.util.Properties;
032import java.util.Set;
033import java.util.stream.Collectors;
034
035/**
036 * An implementation class that gets value from {@link Properties}.
037 */
038public class PropertiesConfiguration extends AbstractFileConfiguration {
039
040    /**
041     * Creates a new {@link PropertiesConfiguration}.
042     *
043     * @param path the filepath to load
044     * @return the new {@link PropertiesConfiguration}
045     */
046    public static @NotNull PropertiesConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path) {
047        return create(path, new Properties());
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * Creates a new {@link PropertiesConfiguration}.
052     *
053     * @param path       the filepath to load
054     * @param properties the {@link Properties}
055     * @return the new {@link PropertiesConfiguration}
056     */
057    public static @NotNull PropertiesConfiguration create(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Properties properties) {
058        return new PropertiesConfiguration(path, copyProperties(properties));
059    }
060
061    private static @NotNull Properties copyProperties(@NotNull Properties source) {
062        var newProperties = new Properties();
063
064        for (var key : source.keySet()) {
065            newProperties.put(key, source.get(key));
066        }
067
068        return newProperties;
069    }
070
071    private final Properties properties;
072
073    private PropertiesConfiguration(@NotNull Path path, @NotNull Properties properties) {
074        super(path);
075        this.properties = properties;
076    }
077
078    @Override
079    public @Nullable Object get(@NotNull String path) {
080        return properties.get(path);
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public void set(@NotNull String path, @Nullable Object value) {
085        boolean remove = value == null;
086
087        if (remove) {
088            properties.remove(path);
089        } else {
090            properties.setProperty(path, value instanceof String ? (String) value : value.toString());
091        }
092    }
093
094    @Override
095    public @NotNull @Unmodifiable List<String> getKeyList() {
096        return properties.keySet()
097                .stream()
098                .map(object -> object instanceof String ? (String) object : object.toString())
099                .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList());
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    public @NotNull @Unmodifiable Set<Object> getValues() {
104        return properties.values().stream().collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableSet());
105    }
106
107    /**
108     * @param path the path to get the {@link Configuration} section
109     * @return {@code null}
110     * @deprecated This method always returns {@code null}.
111     */
112    @Override
113    @Deprecated
114    public @Nullable Configuration getSection(@NotNull String path) {
115        return null;
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * @param path the path to get the {@link Configuration} section
120     * @return {@link MappedConfiguration#create()}
121     * @deprecated {@link PropertiesConfiguration} does not support the section,
122     * so this method always returns {@link MappedConfiguration#create()}.
123     */
124    @Override
125    @Deprecated
126    public @NotNull Configuration getOrCreateSection(@NotNull String path) {
127        return MappedConfiguration.create();
128    }
129
130    @Override
131    public void clear() {
132        properties.clear();
133        setLoaded(false);
134    }
135
136    @Override
137    public @NotNull PropertiesConfiguration copy() {
138        var copied = create(getPath(), properties);
139
140        copied.setLoaded(isLoaded());
141
142        return copied;
143    }
144
145    @Override
146    public void load() throws IOException {
147        clear();
148
149        if (!Files.isRegularFile(getPath())) {
150            return;
151        }
152
153        try (var reader = Files.newBufferedReader(getPath())) {
154            properties.load(reader);
155        }
156
157        setLoaded(true);
158    }
159
160    @Override
161    public void save() throws IOException {
162        save(null);
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Saves {@link Properties} with comments.
167     *
168     * @param comments the comments or {@code null}
169     * @throws IOException if an I/O error occurs
170     */
171    public void save(@Nullable String comments) throws IOException {
172        var parent = getPath().getParent();
173
174        if (parent != null) {
175            Files.createDirectories(parent);
176        }
177
178        try (var writer = Files.newBufferedWriter(getPath(), StandardOpenOption.CREATE, StandardOpenOption.WRITE)) {
179            properties.store(writer, comments);
180        }
181    }
182
183    @Override
184    public boolean equals(Object o) {
185        if (this == o) return true;
186        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) return false;
187        PropertiesConfiguration that = (PropertiesConfiguration) o;
188        return properties.equals(that.properties);
189    }
190
191    @Override
192    public int hashCode() {
193        return Objects.hash(properties);
194    }
195
196    @Override
197    public String toString() {
198        return "PropertiesFileConfiguration{" +
199                "properties=" + properties +
200                '}';
201    }
202}
